column4: Hi. I want to fire up nautilus, thunderbird and firefox using one command. I want them to be executed in the same order, so I 'nautilus && thunderbird && firefox-4.0'. The problem is the the first two parts (nau,tb) work as they should be and the ff opens as I close tb. What am I doing wrong?

I want to fire up nautilus, thunderbird and firefox using one command. I want them to be executed in the same order, so I 'nautilus && thunderbird && firefox-4.0'. The problem is the the first two parts (nau,tb) work as they should be and the ff opens as I close tb. What am I doing wrong?
